default.$description: Used for the default background color.

subtle.$description: Used to slightly differentiate the background from the default.

strong.$description: Used to make the background easily stand out from the default.

disabled.$description: Used to identify a disabled section.

overlap.$description: Used for components, like tooltips and drawers, and content, like a sticky header, that overlap other content.

section.$description: Used for containers, like a card header, that are visually distinct from the default page background only when necessary to maintain affordance and hierarchy in different modes.

overlay.$description: Used for an overlay that covers other content.
